# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/socket.io`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for socket.io (http://socket.io/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/socket.io

 * Dependencies: node
 * Global values: none
